name: Andrea Passerini
content: Andrea Passerini's homepage -- Home Home SML group Publications Teaching Full Professor DISI-Dipartimento di Ingegneria e Scienza dell'Informazione Universit√† degli Studi di Trento Office: Sommarive st. 9, POVO 38123 TN Phone: +39 0461 28 5224 email: I am a Full Professor at the Department of Information Engineering and Computer Science (DISI) of the University of Trento. My main research interests are at the intersection of learning and reasoning, and include structured machine learning, neuro-symbolic integration, explainable and interactive machine learning, preference elicitation and learning with constraints. I am coordinator of the research program on Deep and Structured Machine Learning and head of the Structured Machine Learning group (SML). Further information can be found in my CV, in the page of the SML group, and in my publications page. Department of Information Engineering and Computer Science at the University of Trento
